lines.text: [Malaria Mike the mosquito admires his wanted poster]
Not bad, but it doesn't do justice to me nose.
[Snafu tries to hide underwater, but his bare backside remains exposed]
Why, it's Snafu! I never forget a face.
[Snafu pulls up his trousers and thwarts Malaria Mike's attack]
Caught him with his pants up.
What did you do in the big war, Daddy?
[camera pans to Snafu's head mounted on Malaria Mike's wall]

Just a minute, please. This program has come to you through the courtesy of my sponsor, the United States Army - distributors of G.I. repellent, mosquito nets, atabrine pills and good old-fashioned horse sense. I wish the hell I used 'em!
